name: Spider Hero: Superhero city
description:
Welcome to Spider Hero, the game where the streets are full of hurrying people, colorful cars, huge buildings and... 
Look, this is a strange man in the super hero costume suit! And this spider look is yours! Feel like a real super spider hero, explore this large inhospitable city, rob ordinary people, defeat annoying cops and just have fun playing Spider Hero game.

Check how is it to be someone you’ve never expected to become - a human-like spider hero with super abilities, who roams about the city with the help of its special super ninja ropes! Pass through your own criminal (or maybe not) way defeating different interesting rivals! Become a really legendary heroic creature, whose aim is to conquer this place and just survive as long as possible!

Perform different tricks and stunts with the help of your super ninja spider rope: jump, draw your opponents, climb to different buildings and just enjoy your spider hero abilities! Don’t forget to mind your health indicator and watch mini map: someone can suddenly deals you a maximal damage! Be attentive and careful, do your best and enjoy Spider Hero.
Earn points for successfully completed missions and power your super spider hero up to become more dexterous, faster and just stronger!
